code: export var debounce=function debounce(fn,d){var timer;return function(){var context=this,args=arguments;clearTimeout(timer);timer=setTimeout(function(){fn.apply(context,args);},d);};};export var lowercaseText=function lowercaseText(text){return text.toLowerCase();};export var setKeyWithIndex=function setKeyWithIndex(name,index){return"".concat(name.replaceAll(" ","-").toLowerCase(),"-").concat(index);};export var filterDataByName=function filterDataByName(term,array){return array.filter(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name;return lowercaseText(name).includes(lowercaseText(term));});};
